languages.text: "Да укрепит Его свет наши сердца... нас ждут новые испытания в этом месте".
"May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."
languages.original_text: "Да укрепит Его свет наши сердца... нас ждут новые испытания в этом месте".

traits.locale_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “愿祂的明光坚定我们的心神……这里还有新的试炼在等着我们。”
languages.original_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: “愿祂的明光坚定我们的心神……这里还有新的试炼在等着我们。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Que Su luz endurezca nuestros corazones... nos aguardan nuevas tribulaciones en este lugar».
languages.original_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: «Que Su luz endurezca nuestros corazones... nos aguardan nuevas tribulaciones en este lugar».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「主の光が、我らの心を強くせんことを…この地で、新たな試練が待っている」
languages.original_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: 「主の光が、我らの心を強くせんことを…この地で、新たな試練が待っている」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Möge Sein Licht unsere Herzen härten ... an diesem Ort erwarten uns neue Prüfungen."
languages.original_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: "Möge Sein Licht unsere Herzen härten ... an diesem Ort erwarten uns neue Prüfungen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Que Sa Lumière brille sur nos cœurs... De nouvelles épreuves nous attendent. »
languages.original_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: « Que Sa Lumière brille sur nos cœurs... De nouvelles épreuves nous attendent. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "O'nun ışığı kalplerimizi sağlamlaştırsın... Bizi bu yerde yeni sınavlar bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."

traits.locale_text: "O'nun ışığı kalplerimizi sağlamlaştırsın... Bizi bu yerde yeni sınavlar bekliyor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "May His light harden our hearts... new trials await us in this place."
